string.text: Heavy Pockets
Traders may offer you more rare and expensive goods.
Through trading, looting and stealing you have accumulated a small fortune. Your personal wealth is well known and traders will favour your patronage.
You have unlocked the "Heavy Pockets" achievement.
Radiotherapy
You have a chance of surviving emissions and psi-vortices.
Strangely, you no longer feel haunted by the groans of an approaching emission. You believe there to be a chance they may be more forgiving towards you.
You have unlocked the "Radiotherapy" achievement.
Infopreneur
Brokers will now pay you a small additional bonus for future PDA delivered to them.
Whether selling or buying, to many people information is just as valuable as artefacts. Word has spread that you are a reliable source of such a commodity.
You have unlocked the "Infopreneur" achievement.
Duga Free
Paths through Yantar and Radar are now easier to access.

After seeing what reckless experimentation has brought to the Zone you have taken action into your own hands. Paths through Yantar and Radar are now open since disabling the Miracle Machine and Brain Scorcher.
You have unlocked the "Duga Free" achievement.
Well Dressed
You are experienced with mutant skinning. You got quick hands.
Rightly so does the Zone's wildlife fear you - more than a fair share has fallen at your hands. Lately, you have noticed your bloody harvest has become more bountiful than usual.
You have unlocked the "Well Dressed" achievement.
Silver or Lead
Surrendering stalkers may occasionally reveal the location of a second stash.
Bodies and bullet casings litter the tracks behind you. The stories you leave are infamous. You often wonder why some place possessions above their lives. Perhaps things will soon begin to change.
You have unlocked the "Silver or Lead" achievement.
Mechanized Warfare
Bonus items used in repairs are more effective.
Forester's services have never been cheap, but at least now he has some competition. That technician should make good use of those tools you brought him.
You have unlocked the "Mechanized Warfare" achievement.
Tourist
You recall seeing some curious stashes during earlier journeys.

Despite the dangers, you have explored all accessible parts of the Zone. From the murky depths of the Great Swamp to the metal maze of the Truck Cemetery - you know the Zone like the back of your hand.
You have unlocked the "Tourist" achievement.
Rag and Bone
Your luck with future stashes has slightly increased.
What's theirs is yours, or so you like to think. You have a knack for finding other people's stashes. Despite some misfortune here and there, you feel that for the most part your luck is improving.
You have unlocked the "Rag and Bone" achievement.
Completionist
All available achievements have been unlocked.

All there is to achieve has been achieved. You know the Zone better than the Zone knows itself. And despite all odds being stacked against you, and every threat you've faced - you still remain undefeated.
You have unlocked the "Completionist" achievement.
Wishful Thinking
You've unlocked "Renegades" as a playable faction.
At first you heard the rumours, then you saw it for yourself, and then you revealed it. There will always who will doubt what you accomplished, but the fact remains. The Wish Granter is no more.
You have unlocked the "Wishful Thinking" achievement.
Down to Earth
Mi-2 helicopters will appear in place of Mi-24s.
The higher they fly the harder they fall. Not willing to waste any more expensive equipment, the Zone's helicopters now seem to be of a much weaker variety. But are no less tempting to destroy.
You have unlocked the "Down to Earth" achievement.
Geologist
Artefacts have an increased chance of respawning.

Humming, buzzing and spitting - the anomalies of the Zone do not scare you any longer. After so many successful endeavours, you can't help but notice that artefacts seem more numerous than ever before.
You have unlocked the "Geologist" achievement.
Patriarch
You can recruit more stalkers as companions.

Destroyer of helicopters. Deliverer of PDAs. Stories of your experiences and abilities are renowned throughout the Zone. You have become immortalised; your tales forever spoken of over the Zone's many campfires.
You have unlocked the "Patriarch" achievement.
Bookworm Food
Memory sticks will be replaced by rare PDAs when spawned.
Through your own endeavours or by reading about those of others, you have come to learn a lot about the Zone and its many inhabitants. Perhaps you should consider sharing some of this knowledge?
You have unlocked the "Bookworm Food" achievement.
Infantile Pleasure
Your luck with finding items inside boxes has slightly increased.
Whether you're on an important mission or wasting time, boxes were never safe from your actions. Your outraged behaviour has helped you spotting the little things coming out of smashed boxes.
You have unlocked the "Infantile Pleasure" achievement.
Recycler
For every item you disassemble, there is a little chance of acquiring an extra material.
Believing that every part counts, you cannot help but break down what lies in your hands to its former shape. After a long experience, you became more precise. Dismantling was never been easier.
You have unlocked the "Recycler" achievement.
Artificer Eagerness
Crafting requires one of two less components.
Crafting your own equipment has earned you quite the knowledge and experience. You've improved your techniques over the time, which helps you relying on less resources to obtain the full product.
You have unlocked the "Artificer Eagerness" achievement.
Unforeseen Guest
While being disguise, your behaviour became less suspicious.

After enough successful attempts to get behind the enemy lines, you learned how to slip, observe and adapt among their members. Your behaviour became more convincing, thus drawing attention away from you.
You have unlocked the "Unforeseen Guest" achievement.
Absolver
You've unlocked "Sin" as a playable faction.
Waves of sinners had arisen from the deepest parts, bringing further transgressions to the Zone. You hold against it, and resolved the myth.
You have unlocked the "Absolver" achievement.
Collaborator
You've unlocked "UNISG" as a playable faction.

As you follow the recent events, sides have reached a breaking point. You made an agreement and went along with your fearless willingness. Wether it's for better or worse, you proved to be a worthy recipient.
You have unlocked the "Collaborator" achievement.
Iron Curtain
Your rank and reputation has greatly increased.
You have unlocked the "Iron Curtain" achievement.
Murky Spirit
Your rank and reputation has greatly increased.
You have unlocked the "Murky Spirit" achievement.
Invictus
Your rank and reputation has greatly increased.
You have unlocked the "Invictus" achievement.
